getCollectionId(bytes32,bytes32,uint256).details: Constructs an outcome collection ID from a parent collection and an outcome collection.

getConditionId(address,bytes32,uint256).details: Constructs a condition ID from an oracle, a question ID, and the outcome slot count for the question.

getOutcomeSlotCount(bytes32).details: Gets the outcome slot count of a condition.

getPositionId(address,bytes32).details: Constructs a position ID from a collateral token and an outcome collection.

mergePositions(address,bytes32,bytes32,u.details: Merges multiple positions back into a single position.

prepareCondition(address,bytes32,uint256.details: Prepares a condition by initializing a payout vector associated with the condition.

redeemPositions(address,bytes32,bytes32,.details: Redeems positions after the outcome is known.

reportPayouts(bytes32,uint256[]).details: Called by the oracle to report the results of conditions.

splitPosition(address,bytes32,bytes32,ui.details: Splits a position into multiple outcome slots.
